item.title: What's going on?
item.description: (This is a now page, and if you have your own site, you should make one, too.) Iâ€™m home in Cyberjaya, Malaysia. What am I doing right now: I’m actively looking for a full time remote job. It’s a long overdue. Currently getting the personal cum CV cum portfolio site up for this challenge. Hoping to land one soon. Fingers crossed. Resharpening my frontend development skills I’m revisiting alot of frontend stuff lately, mainly Javascript.
